website_summaries.verdict: Choose these binoculars if you have a child to introduce to bird watching, theater viewing, and more, as they are inexpensive and built with kids in mind.
pros: Soft rubber around eyepieces provides safety
cons: Magnification isn't quite as good as adult models, but young novices probably won't mind

customer_reviews.title: Not toy binoculars
customer_reviews.text: I was super impressed with these little binoculars. I bought two pairs for a 3 yr old and 5 year old for xmas. I was expecting they’d be able to pretend to be explorers with them. The outside box looked a bit cheap, but the binoculars themselves are not. They have some weight to them and the optics seem very good. I decided my boys would not be using them for toy binoculars and need to be more responsible with them.
customer_reviews.author: cara

customer_reviews.title: 2 year old loved it
customer_reviews.text: Two and half year old son loved it. He took it on an airplane to look out the window and then again when we went on a little hike outside. He likes looking out the wrong end, and he doesn't like when we correct him. But he has a lot of fun with it. It was one of his favorite Christmas presents.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth1001

customer_reviews.title: Great buy..
customer_reviews.text: super cute binoculars my four-year-old love them for Christmas you can actually see out of them which is a plus I didn't think you would be able to he plays with them they've been thrown kicked walked on and they've actually held up pretty well we're about a month-and-a-half into having them🤣🤣🤣
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Brown

customer_reviews.title: Fun little binocs!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my 4 year old grand-daughter's birthday during the summer. Every time I went to their house those binoculars were out and being used. Haha, although she insisted on looking through the wrong end of them! But they really did sortof work when used correctly. Obviously not the greatest magnifying qualities but what do you expect for a kids set? She liked them and they didn't end up in the bottom of the toy box (yet) so if she's happy, I'm happy. Edit: that’s been last fall and she’s still using them! That’s a Win in my grandma arsenal!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems good for kids.
customer_reviews.text: Works great and good size for kids. The strap that comes with it doesn't seem to go with it, but we'll make it work. Maybe I just haven't looked at it closely enough.
customer_reviews.author: Shannan Wainwright

customer_reviews.title: Exactly like Grandpa's binoculars!!!
customer_reviews.text: A real hit for granddaughter on her way to the lake!!! It works like Grandpa's and she can watch the boats and birds from the porch. Easy to use with some adult help learning how to look through lens. I would buy again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding & Durable
customer_reviews.text: The first pair had a chunk of manufacturing debris inside one lens BUT I received a FAST reply and FAST exchange! The second pair were perfect!! My nephew uses these hard and often. They are tough and much better quality than I expected. I foresee myself purchasing another pair in a few years for his younger brother!! Outstanding durable item
customer_reviews.author: DiggsLife

customer_reviews.title: Great kids binoculars
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our daughter for her birthday. She loves to play with them and go on adventures to see what she can find.
customer_reviews.author: LGray

customer_reviews.title: My grandson loved these binoculars
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loved these binoculars. They were easy for him to use and built sturdy to withstand the use by a 2 1/2 yr old
customer_reviews.author: Debby Morlachetta

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 for my twins. I expected better quality. Very small and poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: HPMOM

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: This was a hit. My granddaughter loved them and they have held up beautifully. The lense quality is good for the price, focus too. Makes a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Nan W.

customer_reviews.title: More zoom then you would expect!
customer_reviews.text: a decent set of binoculars for a child, plenty of zoom to look closely at medium distance targets and cheap enough that you wont care if destroyed.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Stelly

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, sturdy binoculars.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for my grand daughter and she loves them. It helps her explore her backyard, the local park, and excursions into nature with her parents.
customer_reviews.author: Betty J Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for kids who like to explore
customer_reviews.text: These binoculars are perfect for small size hands and faces. The colors are fun and they’ll provide years of use for kids who like to explore. They’re very functional—very much like adult binoculars, not really a toy.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Does not really work
customer_reviews.text: This item does not focus or work as binoculars. They are very small and you can look through them, but it does not work for real.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Kids love this.
customer_reviews.text: They aren't for adults for actual use. These are made for kids and our grandkids love them. they do take a good beating from them and we have not had any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Wildlife Up Close

customer_reviews.title: Great Children Binoculars
customer_reviews.text: This a great gift for younger children to introduce them to bird watching, very sturdy and lenses do not distort the object being looked at.
customer_reviews.author: rligay

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I like how you could adjust the nose piece when the child grows. Also like the straps, different colors, and shatterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, broke within minutes
customer_reviews.text: Cheap junk. Broke within minutes of child playing with them. About what you might expect at the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 8 x 21 kids binoculars
customer_reviews.text: I returned this item, because they did not focus properly.......made things appear much further away than they actually were.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C.Clark

customer_reviews.title: nice idea, but vision is a bit blurry
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a gift for a child and it was a success. However, I tried to look through the binoculars (one eye at a time, since the distance between both binoculars is adapted to kids eyes distance) and the vision is quite blurry, even when adjusting the focus control.
customer_reviews.author: aviojet

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Bought for gr daughter. We live on a big hill with a large view and she doesn't have to borrow Papaws. Work well
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with purchase
customer_reviews.text: These are very well made and my 4 year old lives them. They really work well and they are easy to focus. I bought another for my nephew.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Durable for kids
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased two of these for my 3yo and 5yo grandkids and they have held up well.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne, Coeur d'Alene, ID

customer_reviews.title: Compact and cute
customer_reviews.text: love the color great for little hands or in pocket Work great. good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Larry M.

customer_reviews.title: Two year old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and great for all ages. My two year old loves it! Comes with straps as well!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah W

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This product is absolute garbage and is in the process of being returned. Not sure if ours is just defective, but it will not focus.
customer_reviews.author: abbychowmane

customer_reviews.title: Colorful durable binoculars for kids
customer_reviews.text: My grandson really liked these and he is 5 and pretty hard on toys. He even thanked me again later because they didn’t break upon use. Very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Ibuy

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for 5 year old boy
customer_reviews.text: Grandson (5) absolutely loved this item and is taking great care of it.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Good child binoculars!
customer_reviews.text: I thought my child would be playing with these more but nonetheless I am glad to have purchased these! They seem to do a decent job in regards to their magnification Andrea feel like these are pretty durable!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small hands
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old grandson loves them. All my other grandkids now want some. Perfect gift.
customer_reviews.author: Janell Gerlach

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy to use for a child!
customer_reviews.text: We put together an adventure backpack for my daughter as a Christmas gift. It had various things in it, including these binoculars. She loves the outdoors, and wildlife, so these were a perfect addition. They were extremely easy to adjust and come with nice little protective case. She absolutely loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Paul B Cartwright

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the cost
customer_reviews.text: My son received these from Santa and he loves them! They are a great quality for kids’ binoculars.
customer_reviews.author: 3cfloyd

customer_reviews.title: Great product!! My boys will love them out hunting
customer_reviews.text: Package was nice and great quality!! My kids will love thesexour hunting with us
customer_reviews.author: Michelle’s music

customer_reviews.title: Fragile
customer_reviews.text: My daughter dropped them once and something shattered on the inside. Such a shame. They were the only thing she wanted for Christmas and she loved them. Now she can only see out of one eye.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Grant

customer_reviews.title: Prepare to be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I returned the set I brought for my grandson. They could not be focused as the focusing mechanism was impossible to operate.
customer_reviews.author: James M. Tingle, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: View close up
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is exploring his world with the help of the up close view with these binoculars.

customer_reviews.title: First thing he said was, it marches my tracktor
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for 31/2 year old great grandson...he still loves them.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for kids
customer_reviews.text: Grandsons love these. Much easier for them to use and more durable. Saves our much nicer pair

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my four year-old grandson to use in “adventures.” I’m sure he will love these.
customer_reviews.author: MomX5

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids love them had to buy 2!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my grandson’s 3rd birthday. He loved them so much. He and his brother who is 5 argued over using them that I bought a 2nd one for my older grandson. They have had them shirt time so can’t comment on the durability yet.
customer_reviews.author: ZAZABO

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and strong. My 3 year old loves them.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get this for my 4 year old. I thought it would be so fun for him. But the quality was terrible there was something in the lenses that made it impossible to see through so I returned them. Disappointed

customer_reviews.title: Cute for kids

customer_reviews.text: BOUGHT FOR A 5 YEAR OLD. HE TALKS ABOUT THEM. ENJOYS WATCH BIRDS.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what they said it was
customer_reviews.text: The binoculars was exactly what was presented. My grand child loved them

customer_reviews.title: Good for this age
customer_reviews.text: We have a 4 year old grandson and he was really excited to see how these work; once he figured that out, he was all over the house and yard using them. Great product for this age group. Denise M.

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent for grandchild.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a 12 year old. She liked them. I liked the price and they didn’t look cheap even though they were very reasonably priced. They worked well.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My son has drop them multiple times no displacement of lenses and they're built like a tank.

customer_reviews.title: Not much  here positive. Too expensive for tiny almost inoperable cheap toy binoculars.
customer_reviews.text: About size of large orange.....small. Hard to hold and use. Viewing is not easy and looks about 10% closer than simply viewing.

customer_reviews.title: Super child binoculars
customer_reviews.text: Grandchildren love them. Easy to use and can see quite a distance with the adjustable lenses.

customer_reviews.title: Very dissatisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Broken. One side does not work and something is rattling around inside it! Very dissatisfied. Was intended as part of my grandsons birthday gift. But now I will have to replace.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our sons birthday. He loved them. They are always around his neck while playing.

customer_reviews.text: Works great and can take a beating! Nothing better for kids

customer_reviews.title: Broke too soon
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not durable, the glass on the inside got knocked out of place only after a few uses.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I appreciated my refund for a product that didn’t work

customer_reviews.title: Good product

customer_reviews.title: Really, really tiny!
customer_reviews.text: I just receive these, and was surprised at how small they are. I think they need to be a little bit bigger even for Preschoolers. The vision quality seems fine.
customer_reviews.author: Di

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: I am glad I checked this out before I wrapped this for my grandson as a Christmas gift. I turned the focus knob to get a clearer view and the thing fell apart. What a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Slick

customer_reviews.title: Came Broken, Not Easy for Kids to see/focus
customer_reviews.text: These came with a cracked lens but given the price we figured it wasn't worth the hassle to send back. They barely magnify anything and they are not easy for little kids to use which is what they were intended for. Focusing is hard and it's hard to get a full circle picture to see.
customer_reviews.author: AGrayClay

customer_reviews.title: Durable but blurry
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my 6 year old for Christmas, she’s just not getting out there to look for birds and she complained they’re blurry not matter how she try’s to adjust them, she loses interest because of it but they are durable so that’s good since she brings them all over the yard
customer_reviews.author: Kylepluse

customer_reviews.title: Broke first week.
customer_reviews.text: They broke in two the same week. They were made for children, really thought they would be more durable. Birthday present for my 9 year old, and they broke 3 days after he got them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this product!
customer_reviews.text: This product is very cheaply made. The right lens protection came right off the first try to adjust the lens. Never got to even focus on an object. Very frustrating and not suitable for children. Returned the item for full refund the next day.
customer_reviews.author: u. bingham

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Didn't have high expectations, but these are terrible to look through - should have spent a little more and gotten something more rugged.
customer_reviews.author: Satcomwitty

customer_reviews.title: Good gift for bird watching practice for little ones!
customer_reviews.text: These are for my 4 year old granddaughter's birthday in December so I don't know how well they will work, but they are cute, right size for little hands and look durable!
customer_reviews.author: Grammy

product_meta.title: Best Toys for 4-9 Year Old Boys, Happy Gift 8x21 Compact Waterproof Travel Binoculars,Best Gifts for Kids (Orange)
product_meta.description:
Color:OrangeOutdoor learning has never been this much fun! Now with the improved Shock Proof 8 x 22 Binoculars, kids can enjoy and learn at the same time. These compact binoculars are designed for both boys and girls, but not to be taken for a cheap toy! They work very nicely and produce a clear sharp image. Give your child an experience that will last a lifetime! This Binoculars is lightweight, you can take anywhere!

Specifications: 
lens coating: fmc product 
magnification: 8x ocular lens diameter: 12 mm
objective lens diameter: 21 mm 
field of view: 126m / 1000m (yard) 
prism type: bak 4, 100% of the reflected light can make more clear and bright image. 
Material: high quality rubber, non-slip hand wheel center design
Weight: 230 g
mini size: 12 x 9 x 7.5 cm
exit pupil distance: 10 mm
eyecups system: twist to match eye to eye
distance angular field of view: 7.2 degrees 
Package included: 
1 x Binoculars 
1 x Binoculars carrying bag 
1 x Lens cloth 
1 x Operations Manual 
1 x Lanyard 
Note: 
1. Please do not use it on the contrary! Just use it correctly as image showed! 
2. Here Night Vision means you can use it when the aims point has light. 
3. To proper eye alignment for your little kid, you can proper folding the binoculars. 

These make the perfect gifts, so don't hesitate to buy for your friends and family!
feature_bullets: SUPER SAFETY -Soft Rubber Surrounded Eyepieces are included for eye protection and optical glass lens,so children don't hurt their eyes or face. There is extra coating surrounding the eyepieces compared to other brands and provides better protection of the lens during falls.

SUPERIOR DESIGN - Non-slip scratch, the grip has been ergonomically patented designed the rubberized hand grips perfect for little hands, the binoculars are easy to focus and can be adjusted to easily match the eye distance gap give little adventurers a closer view of nature! The leaves of a tree 100 yards away came into sharp focus.

SHOCK PROOF AND LIFE WATERPROOF - Durable binoculars that can withstand drops and falls on floors due to rubber coating that absorbs shock. If accidentally dropped on the ground, the binoculars are protected from damage with shock proof rubber armor compared to other brands and provides better protection of the lens during falls，life waterproof design,to avoid rain and mold.

STABILIZATION CLEAR IMAGE - This product has a superb magnifcation of 8X and the FMC prism green coated optics system can control optical reflection to create high definition and colorful images.Multi-layer broadband coating technology, Designed for children to use easily, Binoculars can be folded to MATCH eye to eye distance of child, make you see the scene more realistic.

Widely Used - Our product have a superb magnifcation of 8X with an amazing view. You can focus by simply turning the Center Dial. The binoculars can be adjusted to easily match the eye distance gap for each child. Great for bird watching, learning, hunting, theaters, boat rides, hiking, traveling and enjoying the wilderness!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars457 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
